MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY10 postcode area of Anstruther. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at Midnight due to an unsafe situation onsite regarding an underground cable fault near Crail and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:03am on 6th February
